title: Fed up with Trump's America, Canadians are staying home, boycotting
shortDescription: Relations have gotten so bad Canadians have been booing the American National Anthem during hockey games.

title: Here's why Trump can't abolish Education Department single-handedly
shortDescription: While Trump has abolished other agencies by executive order, he can't end the Education Department on his own because Congress created it in statute.

title: Firings, tariffs and Teslas: How Trump has sown chaos and confusion
shortDescription: Trump has sent financial markets into a tailspin by firing thousands of federal employees and slapping tariffs on imports. What is his end game?

title: Democrats livid as Schumer, 9 other senators vote to avoid shutdown
shortDescription: House Democrats and activists are railing against Senate Democrats as they advance GOP funding bill.

title: Shutdown averted: Senate passes funding bill
shortDescription: One crisis was avoided as a midnight deadline loomed to keep the government funded.

title: Trump officials cheer 'self-deportation' of pro-Palestinian protester
shortDescription: The unusual decision to post the video on social media reflects the attention Trump has given pro-Palestinian protesters at Columbia.

title: Trump envoy calls Hamas 'impractical' in ceasefire talks
shortDescription: Steven Witkoff, Trump's Middle East envoy, called Hamas' response to a hostage and ceasefire proposal 'impractical.'

title: Former GOP Sen. Alan Simpson dies in Wyoming
shortDescription: A proud advocate for conservative causes, former senator Alan Simpson had a strong libertarian streak that supported abortion rights and gay equality.

title: Could Trump’s tariffs spur a recession?
shortDescription: An economist warns consumers about a potential economic downturn with President Donald Trump's trade war pressing on.

title: Schumer to vote for funding bill, reducing shutdown odds | The Excerpt
shortDescription: Plus: A Reuters/Ipsos poll finds most Americans believe President Donald Trump is being too “erratic” on the economy. It's all on The Excerpt.

title: Senate-passed GOP spending bill heads to Trump, no government shutdown
shortDescription: President Trump praised Senate Minority Leader Chuck Schumer for saying he would back the GOP spending bill to avert a government shutdown.

title: Trump administration outlines demands to restore Columbia funding
shortDescription: The Ivy League university has faced intense scrutiny from the Trump administration over its handling of pro-Palestinian student protests in 2024.

title: Sen. Chuck Schumer to vote for funding bill
shortDescription: Democratic Senator Chuck Schumer says he will vote for the GOP funding bill to avoid a government shutdown.

title: Chuck Schumer says he'll vote for Republican funding bill
shortDescription: Senate Minority Leader Chuck Schumer, D-N.Y., said he will vote for the GOP funding extension, which must pass Friday to avoid a shutdown.

title: What type of cancer did Rep. Raul Grijalva have? Congressman dies at 77
shortDescription: Longtime Rep. Raul Grijalva, D-Ariz. passed away at 77 on Thursday after a battle with lung cancer.
